title: Jon Taffer's Advice From An Adult, Dan Soder Gets Robbed, and Daaaaaa Jankees Lose
description:
Feits and Kev recap the Yankee red sox game. Quickly talk about the new KFCR radio schedule then they get into Jon Taffer and talk about the UFC fight and then ask about the first date at a wedding idea. Then Dan comes on and they talk about Kev's flame thrower, NCAA football being brought back, Dan living with a weed dealer and getting robbedÂ  in college (while being hogtied and pistol whipped) then Voicemails of wife making her husband sit when he pees and VC of girl asking if it is rude to masturbate next to your partner while they're sleeping.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
